message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its worth. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $100.
I understand that $100 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $105.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'm counteroffering at $115.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $112.
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to meet you at $112.5. I'm counteroffering at $112.50.
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the extra 50 cents. I'd like to try to get a better deal. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $111.50.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $112.50, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm counteroffering at $112.25.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. I'd like to make a final counteroffer of $111.75.
